analysis.title: Hidden Treasures - Secret Tools & Underground Gems | The Everything Gateway
analysis.meta_description: The internet's best-kept secrets. Discover 50+ powerful tools and hidden gems that insiders use but rarely share. Welcome to the underground.

links.text: ← Back to Gateway

🔍

Regex101
The ultimate regex testing and debugging tool with real-time explanation - used by developers worldwide but unknown to most

📸

Carbon
Turn your code into beautiful, shareable images. Create stunning code screenshots for presentations and social media

✏️

Excalidraw
Mind-blowing collaborative whiteboarding tool that feels like magic. Hand-drawn style diagrams that actually look professional

🌳

JSON Crack
Visualize JSON data as interactive graphs. Turn complex data structures into beautiful, understandable diagrams

🌟

Ray.so
Create beautiful code images with customizable themes, backgrounds, and syntax highlighting

📷

Codeshot
Screenshot your code with beautiful syntax highlighting and customizable themes

🚀

Hoppscotch
API testing tool that's faster and cleaner than Postman. Lightweight, beautiful, and completely free

⚡

HTTPie
Modern command-line HTTP client with an intuitive UI. Makes API testing feel effortless

📋

JSONFormatter
Format, validate, and beautify JSON data. Includes advanced features like JSON to CSV conversion

🎲

Mockaroo
Generate massive amounts of realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats

🔗

Webhook.site
Test webhooks and HTTP requests with a unique URL. See requests in real-time with detailed logs

💻

Replit
Code, compile, and run programs in 50+ languages directly in your browser. Collaborative coding made simple

🖊️

CodePen
Frontend playground for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Test ideas instantly and discover amazing demos

🖼️

Remove.bg
AI-powered background removal that rivals Photoshop. One-click transparent backgrounds for any image

🎬

Unscreen
Remove video backgrounds automatically using AI. No green screen required

🎨

Photopea
Full Photoshop alternative in your browser. Edit PSD files, create graphics, completely free

🎯

Figma Community
Thousands of free design resources, UI kits, and templates that designers gatekeep

🌈

Coolors
Generate perfect color palettes with AI. Extract colors from images and create stunning combinations

📷

Unsplash
High-quality, royalty-free photos from talented photographers worldwide

✨

Canva
Design anything with drag-and-drop simplicity. Templates for everything from social media to presentations
